channel.title: [317] how can i make a pk zone?
channel.description:
i want to make a pk zone and dont know how can any give me a tutorial of some help for me
i have looked in the tutorials but find nothing :(
grtz, KoF

item.title: [317] how can i make a pk zone?
item.dc:creator: @KoF KoF
item.description:
@KoF wrote:

thx i want to try

edit: whats wrong with this?

public boolean isInWilderness(int coordX, int coordY, int Type) { if (Type == 1) { if ((coordY >= 3523) && (coordY <= 3967) && (coordX <= 3392) && (coordX >= 2942) || absX >= 3220 && absX <= 3299 && absY >= 3520 && absY <=3548 || absX >= 2250 && absX <= 2296 && absY >= 4676 && absY <=4715 || absX >= 3332 && absX <= 3356 && absY >= 3244 && absY <=3257) { return true; } } else if (Type == 2) { if ((coordY >= 3512) && (coordY <= 3967) && (coordX <= 3392) && (coordX >= 2942)) { return true; } } else if (Type == 3) { if ((coordY >= 2513) && (coordY <= 2540) && coordX <= 4638) && (coordX >= 4663)) { return true; } } return false; }

item.source: [317] how can i make a pk zone?

item.title: [317] how can i make a pk zone?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

What spades posted just makes a boolean that sees if the person is in the wilderness. What you need is add a new boolean that will determine if the person is in the PK box, and then return the boolean. Spade also did not include the whole method.

public boolean isInWilderness(int coordX, int coordY, int Type) {
	if(isInPkBox()) return false;
	if(isinsafewild()) return true;
		if (Type == 1) {
			if ((coordY >= 3523) && (coordY <= 3967) && (coordX <= 3392)
					&& (coordX >= 2942) || absX >= 3220 && absX <= 3299 && absY >= 3520 && absY <=3548 || absX >= 2250 && absX <= 2296 && absY >= 4676 && absY <=4715) {
				return true;
			}
		} else if (Type == 2) {
			if ((coordY >= 3512) && (coordY <= 3967) && (coordX <= 3392)
					&& (coordX >= 2942)) {
				return true;
			}
} else if (Type == 3) {
if ((coordY >= BOTTOMCOORD) && (coordY <= TOPCOORD) && coordX <= RIGHTCOORD) && (coordX >= LEFTCOORD)) {
return true;
}
}

I did not C+P that so it is hard to do conventions.

Read full topic

			if ((coordY >= 3512) && (coordY <= 3967) && (coordX <= 3392)
